title: Why Pop Star Ahri?
body:
So, I think Astronautilus is a really clever name. As is Brolaf.

So why can't we call Pop Star Ahri, Pop Stahri?

I just want more puns!

replies.body:
Academy Vladimir?
Acadimir.
*slow claps*

RIOT he has a very valid point!


......also.....i want Pretty Princess Sion :P
*Pretty Princess Urgot is what you meant to type! Don't worry I got you ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

I'm still waiting on Battle Bunny Urgot. 
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/4047aad67f18089af35eb59a230bbaa7.jpg

On top of that, Urgod (Or Hedonism Urgot).

Seriously, how hard would it be to replicate something like this:
http://thecakelies.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/CAozN.jpg
that made me LOL

Haha that too. YES!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ZsqaO2M6dM
Pop tarts Ahri. Sorry couldn't resist.
One of the seasons for the Victorious skin, it should be Viktor and the skin's name should just be "Viktorious"

> [{quoted}](name=Bergk,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oOxYPELQ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-09-09T08:38:37.291+0000)
>
> One of the seasons for the Victorious skin, it should be Viktor and the skin's name should just be "Viktorious"

That tv show was atrocious. no thanks
yes please
Puns for the Pun God!

this is my seal of approval 
http://img05.deviantart.net/02ff/i/2012/351/c/6/seal_of_approval_by_magnaen-d5oa99s.jpg

This pun doesn't really work... at least with the Korean pronounciation of Ahri's name. Idk. It isn't necessary. 
Kitty Katarina, though...
Kittyrina?
Snowstorm Sivir? Should've named it Shivir.
Its even worse that they named the skin Kitty Cat Katarina instead of Kitty Katarina
I personally would like to see {{champion:201}} Queen.
This was brought up on the origional popstar Ahri release and the comment got 1k+ upvotes. I agree with you. We need PopstAhri
When they announced this skin I literally told all my friends I would not buy this unless they renamed it Pop Stahri. Jk. I have no friends BibleThump
They've been shying away from pun names for "clarity".
And then there is Urf The Nami-tee, weakest pun ever with 0 clarity.
Nipgot
...not gonna lie i read that as a racial slur by accident lol

I think, honestly (and not to burst your bubble) but Brolaf and Astronautilus are MEANT to be funny skins, thus Riot gave them punny names.

Pop Star Ahri is based off your typical K-Pop singer. There's no real room for puns there. K-Pop groups aren't meant to be funny.

As much as I may agree with you on the name choice, this is the actual answer to your question. ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Masochistic Brat,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oOxYPELQ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-09-09T07:58:48.638+0000)
>
 K-Pop groups aren't meant to be funny.
> 

they're just meant to be terrible :P
true
Ahrianna Grande should be the popstar ahri skin name...
Po*n Star Ahri ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
